supers2506: Find a good trainer to learn good technique. Focus on technique and proper form, don’t rush to increase the weight. I struggle working out on my own, so a gym buddy or group classes motivate me. You’ve got this! 💪💪💪
_jens.life: Loving this outfit and post. Activity isn’t always about weight loss. So many other benefits. Good on you.
kimbalikes: Looking awesome! Love the matchy matchy. With my chronic pain issues, exercise is very tricky for me. It’s a fine balance between trying to regain some strength and not increasing the inflammation.

vanessa_francis44: Be constant with your training. I despise cardio so i have gone to weight training only. I have found that muscle loss happens really quickly.
